sentences.en: A bayonet had been thrust through his belly.
sentences.cn: 一把刺刀刺穿了他的肚子.

sentences.en: A growing youth has a wolf in his belly.
sentences.cn: 年轻人,在成长,吃起饭来像饿狼.

sentences.en: Each gag was rewarded with a generous belly-laugh.
sentences.cn: 每一次插科打诨都引来一阵开怀大笑。

sentences.en: He had an awful ache in the belly.
He was short and fat, with a large beer belly.
sentences.cn: 他又矮又胖，挺着个大啤酒肚。

sentences.en: His eyes are bigger than his belly.
I really can't afford to see this company go belly up.
sentences.cn: 我绝对不能眼睁睁地看着这家公司垮掉。

sentences.en: Jiro waddled closer, his belly bulging and distended.
sentences.cn: 伊罗步履蹒跚地走近，肚子鼓胀凸出。

sentences.en: Misers put their back and their belly into their pockets.
sentences.cn: 守财奴爱财如命,宁可饿肚皮,没衣穿.

sentences.en: She laid her hands on her swollen belly.
sentences.cn: 她把手放在隆起的肚子上。

sentences.en: The boat carried with much cargo in its belly.
sentences.cn: 该船的舱里载了很多的货物.

sentences.en: The boss has a large belly.
The crew finally landed the plane on its belly on the soft part of the runway.
sentences.cn: 机组人员终于使飞机腹部在跑道土质松软的部分着地。

sentences.en: The middle button of his uniform jacket was strained over his belly.
sentences.cn: 制服上装中间的纽扣在他的肚子上绷得紧紧的。

sentences.en: Tim clasped his hands together and held them loosely in front of his belly.
sentences.cn: 蒂姆双手紧扣，放松置于腹前。

sentences.en: You'll eat so much your belly'll be like a barrel.
sentences.cn: 你会吃得肚子鼓鼓的，像个大酒桶。

words.tran_cn: 隆起；爬行（belly的过去分词形式）

trans.tran_en: the middle part of an animal’s body, near its stomach
to fill with air and become rounder in shape
